title: Humphrey's Tree Falls Down
itunes:author: Rhea Pechter
itunes:summary:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting [THIS LINK](https://amzn.to/3RRovO5). I hope you LOVE IT!
Humphrey’s Tree Falls Down stars our friend Humphrey the squirrel in a rhyming story based on something that happened in my REAL LIFE! This is a story about a scary event told in a not so scary way, and it gently addresses how children (and adults) may process upsetting situations.
If you’d like to see a photo of what really happened at my house when the tree fell down, I’ll be posting a photo on Facebook & Instagram (@littlestoriestinypeople).
Make sure you are subscribed to the podcast so you never miss a new episode! Also, please do me a favor and rate & review the show on Apple Podcasts! Every review makes the show more visible in search results and allows more families to find the podcast. I love seeing your feedback and learning how Little Stories for Tiny People fits into your children’s lives. Thank you!!!
Please take a moment to share LSFTP with a friend! Whether it is in person at a playgroup, in an email to friends, or a share on social media, it truly makes a big difference!
If you’d like your child’s name included in a special illustration at the back of the upcoming picture book (yay!), go to www.littlestoriestinypeople.com and sign up for the email newsletter!

content:encoded:
LSFTP Update! My LITTLE HEDGEHOG PICTURE BOOK is AVAILABLE NOW! Find it by searching for "Little Hedgehog Goes to School" on Amazon or by visiting THIS LINK. I hope you LOVE IT!

Humphrey’s Tree Falls Down stars our friend Humphrey the squirrel in a rhyming story based on something that happened in my REAL LIFE! This is a story about a scary event told in a not so scary way, and it gently addresses how children (and adults) may process upsetting situations.

If you’d like to see a photo of what really happened at my house when the tree fell down, I’ll be posting a photo on Facebook & Instagram (@littlestoriestinypeople).

Make sure you are subscribed to the podcast so you never miss a new episode! Also, please do me a favor and rate & review the show on Apple Podcasts! Every review makes the show more visible in search results and allows more families to find the podcast. I love seeing your feedback and learning how Little Stories for Tiny People fits into your children’s lives. Thank you!!!

Please take a moment to share LSFTP with a friend! Whether it is in person at a playgroup, in an email to friends, or a share on social media, it truly makes a big difference!

If you’d like your child’s name included in a special illustration at the back of the upcoming picture book (yay!), go to www.littlestoriestinypeople.com and sign up for the email newsletter!
